message: I would be most interested in hearing about the technical details behind some the algorithms employed. (The first show was quite impressive given the tour of the server room on prime-time American TV.)
Here's some background material: http://ff.im/wx0KX to get the discussion rolling...
here's a wonderful tutorial on building Watson Jr. http://goo.gl/fBBJI -- after skimming over the hardware config, I'll be creating new topics here for the (open source) software used.
